es.uvigo.esei.amchartsjava.core.api.charts

Interface IAmPieChartController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAmchartController<AmChart>, IAmSlicedChartController<AmSlicedChart>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmPieChartController

    public interface IAmPieChartController
extends IAmSlicedChartController<AmSlicedChart>
    Interface for controller of AmPieChart. Details of AmPieChart and its properties in AmCharts API
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
